description: Newly renovated apartment in Central Harlem. Close to restaurants, 125th street and 3 blocks from 2/3 subway line.
name: Great apartment in Central Harlem.
review:
The place was great. It was comfortable and cozy and nicely furnished. It's on the fifth floor at the top of the stairs so you get plenty of exercise. It's close by to a subway and within walking distance of a bunch of great restaurants. 

I didn't see anywhere to adjust the heat so we had to have the window open most of the time.
